title: solution design for the deployment of SAP to VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF) for Classic on IBM Cloud
introduction: Enterprise-class, mission critical workloads need to be resilient and provide High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) capabilities. This pattern can be used as a guide to meet typical customer requirements and provide a base reference solution for a secure and resilient SAP NetWeaver and SAP HANA or SAP NetWeaver and SAP AnyDB deployment to VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF) for Classic on IBM CLoud
